mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM cms_jg_dispute
booked_date >= concat(#{beginDate},' 00:00:00')
AND booked_date <=concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
AND county_code = #{countyCode}
AND (org_name like concat('%',#{key},'%') OR identify_type = #{key})
ORDER BY booked_date

select a.dx_id AS id,c.org_id orgId from cs_outp_visit_dx a left join ss_dic_infection b on(a.icd_code=b.code) left join cs_outp_visit c on(a.visti_id=c.visti_id)
c.org_id in
#{orgId}
and c.visit_date >=#{beginDate,jdbcType=OTHER} and c.visit_date <=#{endDate,jdbcType=OTHER} and b.code IS NOT NULL
